mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id=#{id} AND pwd=MD5(#{pwd}) and user_validity=true;

SELECT m.member_no, i_cname, i_startday, i_endday, (select teacher_img_org from course where course.course_no = pd.course_no) as teacher_img FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no} AND STR_TO_DATE(i_startday, '%Y-%m-%d') <= CURDATE() AND STR_TO_DATE(i_endday, '%Y-%m-%d') > CURDATE() order by i_startday

SELECT m.member_no, pay_date, p.order_no, i_cname, i_price, i_startday, i_endday, (select teacher_img_org from course where course.course_no = pd.course_no) as teacher_img FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no = pd.order_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no}
select cname, q_title, q_writedate from member m, course c, qna q where m.member_no = q.member_no and c.course_no = q.course_no and m.member_no = #{member_no} order by q_writedate
select cname, r_title, r_writedate from member m, review r, course c where m.member_no = r.member_no and m.member_no = #{member_no} order by r_writedate
